EmailTemplate.subject: NovoFX Beta testing link
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear valued client,
Congratulations, you have been added to NovoFX Staff Pilot Testing Group.
To download NovoFX, please open the link below on your Android device:
https://play.google.com/apps/testing/za.co.absa.novofx.roa
Once you have opened the above link, please follow these instructions:
You will be directed to Google Play, at the bottom of the screen select the Become a Tester button The next screen will confirm that you are a tester In the middle of the screen, select the Download the NovoFX Africa link You will directed to the NovoFX Africa home page on the Google Play Store where you can install the application
What happens next?
- You will need to sign up to create a NovoFX profile.
- Attached is an easy guide that illustrates the steps to sign up.
Support details:
- Should you need any help using NovoFX, please contact the NovoFX Support Team on +27 11 895 7989 or send an email to novofxroa@absa.com.
- Please note that the NovoFX Support Team is available from 11:00 â€“ 18:00 East African Time on weekdays only.
We look forward to hearing your feedback! This is just the first step in the journey and we ask for patience during the staff pilot.
The NovoFX Team
